content:
I haven't found the most recent Taiwanese work yet it's similar to this company onto 45% overall demoed with 3 others in the biz:
https://pv-magazine-usa.com/2018/11/23/all-i-want-for-christmas-is-a-90-efficient-solar-panel/#content

Then, the aluminum-ion battery is being held back in the USA, almost to production elsewhere:

Aluminum battery from Stanford offers safe alternative to conventional batteries. The new aluminum-ion battery could replace many of the lithium-ion and alkaline batteries in wide use today.: https://news.stanford.edu/2015/04/06/aluminum-ion-battery-033115/
